description: This course covers the major differences between Creation and Evolutionary philosophy. We will explore the philosophies inspired by Evolution including racism, Nazism, and Communism. By the end of this course, you will be able to effectively debate this issue with friends, family or colleagues. If you have an interest in philosophy or in the differences between creation and evolution, this course is for you. We invite you to examine the evidence for yourself.
title: 109  -  Evolutionary Ethics
